definition: to read/to study/reading of word (i.e. pronunciation), similar to 拼音[pin1 yin1]

sentences.english: At the same time, the North is going through a murky, ill-understood succession crisis.
sentences.chinese: 同時，北方正在經歷一個模糊而難以讀懂的接班危機。

sentences.english: He only uses the hand signal and she converses, Possible she to be able to read his each look.
sentences.chinese: 它只用手勢和她交談，可能她能讀懂他的每一個眼神。

sentences.english: The society can have too vulgar to be endured, few people read my heart.
sentences.chinese: 俗不可耐的社會，能有幾人讀懂我的內心。

sentences.english: They could easily get to do the typing.
sentences.chinese: 那樣裁剪師就可以很容易地讀懂圖紙了，是嗎？

sentences.english: What we read to understand again from the big banyan body to is a winter.
sentences.chinese: 哦，我們從大榕樹身上又讀懂了什麼是冬天。

sentences.english: One negative experience can – with time – help you create many very positive experiences.
sentences.chinese: 真正讀懂一次掉敗漸漸可以帶來多次樂成。

sentences.english: Although there's no new word in the passage, I can't understand it.
sentences.chinese: 儘管這篇短文中沒有生詞，我卻仍沒有讀懂。

sentences.english: To read and understand English newspapers, journals, magazines and books.
sentences.chinese: 能讀懂一樣尋常的報刊文章書籍。

sentences.english: What I understood your eyes, your care.
sentences.chinese: 更讓我讀懂了你的雙眸，你的關懷。

sentences.english: You should be able to read the code and see what it does.
sentences.chinese: 基本上說，你應該能夠讀懂代碼，知道它在幹什麼。

sentences.english: Guys, there is your chance to solve unsolvable enigma called women .
sentences.chinese: 夥計們，你有機會來讀懂女人了。

sentences.english: The bottom line is that you need to make it easy on your reviewer.
sentences.chinese: 底限是你必須讓你的評審人輕鬆讀懂。

sentences.english: I have no difficulty in understanding his body language.
sentences.chinese: 我能好不困難的讀懂他的肢體語言。

sentences.english: That's onl read comprehension, I wrote down what I'd understood.
sentences.chinese: 只是閱讀理解，能讀懂就能把它寫下來。

sentences.english: This kind of dream can be easily understood without dream interpreting.
sentences.chinese: 無須解夢，人們就能輕易讀懂這類夢。

sentences.english: This is a bigger chess game that none of us can comprehend.
sentences.chinese: 全世界正在下一盤很大的棋，沒有人能夠真正讀懂它。
